ClassDecl.Name: TextLines
ClassDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> A class to maintain multiple lines of text buffer. </summary> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetCount
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Returns the number of text lines. </summary> <returns>The number of text lines.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetLine
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Returns the text line of a specified row number. </summary> <returns>The related text line object.</returns> <param name="row">The specified row number.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetCharMeasurer
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Returns the binded <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::elements::text::CharMeasurer@s:vl.presentation.elements.text.CharMeasurer" /></links>. </summary> <returns>The binded <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::elements::text::CharMeasurer@s:vl.presentation.elements.text.CharMeasurer" /></links>.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetCharMeasurer
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Binded a <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::elements::text::CharMeasurer@s:vl.presentation.elements.text.CharMeasurer" /></links>. </summary> <param name="value">The <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::elements::text::CharMeasurer@s:vl.presentation.elements.text.CharMeasurer" /></links> to bind.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetRenderTarget
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Returns the binded <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::elements::IGuiGraphicsRenderTarget@s:vl.presentation.elements.IGuiGraphicsRenderTarget" /></links>. </summary> <returns>The binded <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::elements::IGuiGraphicsRenderTarget@s:vl.presentation.elements.IGuiGraphicsRenderTarget" /></links>.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetRenderTarget
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Binded a <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::elements::IGuiGraphicsRenderTarget@s:vl.presentation.elements.IGuiGraphicsRenderTarget" /></links>. </summary> <param name="value">The <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::elements::IGuiGraphicsRenderTarget@s:vl.presentation.elements.IGuiGraphicsRenderTarget" /></links> to bind.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetText
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Returns a string from a specified range of the text lines. </summary> <returns>The string.</returns> <param name="start">The start position.</param> <param name="end">The end position.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetText
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Returns the whole string in the text lines. </summary> <returns>The string.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetText
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Set the string to the text lines. This operation will modified every <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::elements::text::TextLine@s:vl.presentation.elements.text.TextLine" /></links> objects. </summary> <param name="value">The string to set into the text lines.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: RemoveLines
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Remove text lines in a specified range. </summary> <returns>Returns true if this operation succeeded.</returns> <param name="start">The first row number.</param> <param name="count">The number of text lines to be removed.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: IsAvailable
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Test is a text position available in the text lines. </summary> <returns>Returns true if this position is available.</returns> <param name="pos">The text position to test.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: Normalize
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Normalize a text position to be available. </summary> <returns>The normalized text position.</returns> <param name="pos">The text position to normalize.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: Modify
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Modify some text lines by replacing characters. </summary> <returns>The new end position.</returns> <param name="start">The start position of the range of characters to be replaced.</param> <param name="end">The end position of the range of characters to be replaced.</param> <param name="inputs">The buffer to the string buffers to replace into the text lines.</param> <param name="inputCounts">The numbers of characters for each string buffer.</param> <param name="rows">The number of string buffers.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: Modify
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Modify some text lines by replacing characters. </summary> <returns>The new end position.</returns> <param name="start">The start position of the range of characters to be replaced.</param> <param name="end">The end position of the range of characters to be replaced.</param> <param name="input">The buffer to the string to replace into the text lines.</param> <param name="inputCount">The number of characters to replace into the text lines.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: Modify
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Modify some text lines by replacing characters. </summary> <returns>The new end position.</returns> <param name="start">The start position of the range of characters to be replaced.</param> <param name="end">The end position of the range of characters to be replaced.</param> <param name="input">The string to replace into the text lines.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: Modify
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Modify some text lines by replacing characters. </summary> <returns>The new end position.</returns> <param name="start">The start position of the range of characters to be replaced.</param> <param name="end">The end position of the range of characters to be replaced.</param> <param name="input">The string to replace into the text lines.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: Clear
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Remove every text lines. </summary> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: ClearMeasurement
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Clear all cached <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::elements::text::CharAtt::rightOffset@s:vl.presentation.elements.text.CharAtt" /></links>. </summary> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetTabSpaceCount
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Returns the number of spaces to replace a tab character for rendering. </summary> <returns>The number of spaces to replace a tab character for rendering.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetTabSpaceCount
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Set the number of spaces to replace a tab character for rendering. </summary> <param name="value">The number of spaces to replace a tab character for rendering.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: MeasureRow
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Measure all characters in a specified row. </summary> <param name="row">The specified row number.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetRowWidth
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Returns the width of a specified row. </summary> <returns>The width of a specified row, in pixel.</returns> <param name="row">The specified row number.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetRowHeight
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Returns the height of a row. </summary> <returns>The height of a row, in pixel.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetMaxWidth
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Returns the total width of the text lines. </summary> <returns>The width of the text lines, in pixel.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetMaxHeight
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Returns the total height of the text lines. </summary> <returns>The height of the text lines, in pixel.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetTextPosFromPoint
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Get the text position near to specified point. </summary> <returns>The text position.</returns> <param name="point">The specified point, in pixel.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetPointFromTextPos
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Get the point of a specified text position. </summary> <returns>The point, in pixel. Returns (-1, -1) if the text position is not available.</returns> <param name="pos">The specified text position.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetRectFromTextPos
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Get the bounds of a specified text position. </summary> <returns>The bounds, in pixel. Returns (-1, -1, -1, -1) if the text position is not available.</returns> <param name="pos">The specified text position.</param> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: GetPasswordChar
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Get the password mode displaying character. </summary> <returns>The password mode displaying character. Returns L'\0' means the password mode is not activated.</returns> </Document>

FuncDecl.Name: SetPasswordChar
FuncDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Set the password mode displaying character. </summary> <param name="value">The password mode displaying character. Set to L'\0' to deactivate the password mode.</param> </Document>
